item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 7)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 8)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Butcher (Level 5)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Miller (Level 7)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 225 times with git add -p.

item.title: Collector (Level 5)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Socialite (Level 5)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Historian (Level 6)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Thug (Level 2)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 3)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 3)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 2)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Apprentice Goldsmith (Level 1)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 2)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Gipsy (Level 4)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Miller (Level 6)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 111 times with git add -p.

item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.
